column4: Um, I accidently copied an unwritable folder to my  'Musics' folder, I can't delete it. I have tried sudo chown charles /home/charles/Musics/Buckethead
or what not. the -R makes it recursive and does it to all of the files and folders in that directory.
no, try to do "sudo nautilus" in the terminal and just right click the folder to change them.
